segments.text: Now, look at those two sneaky little rascals over there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that stool, it looks very wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My goodness, that stool is really tilted, it could tip any second!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in the cookie jar, a true mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she's standing there, arm outstretched, ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly working together in this clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those cookies just looking at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so engrossed, they probably don't even hear the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely a secret, I can tell by their focused expressions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, it's going to be a loud crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the mess, cookies everywhere and a crying child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They need to be more careful, this is quite dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood mischief scene, isn't it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The anticipation on the girl's face is quite sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
